body_html: This is a tough one to debug because the main impl is in written in Eigen. Looks like the issue happens when the 2nd argument is near 1, but it's hard to dig deeper than that without having proper hardware to test on. @petewarden do we have the ability to easily run some of our python unit tests on ARM hardware?

body: This is a tough one to debug because the main impl is in written in Eigen.  Looks like the issue happens when the 2nd argument is near 1, but it's hard to dig deeper than that without having proper hardware to test on.  @petewarden do we have the ability to easily run some of our python unit tests on ARM hardware?
